name: Real Stunt Car
description:
This offroad terrain is entirely a new experience with extreme SUV driving with speed racing atmosphere. Yes! It is not only mountain climbing or bumpy roads but is speedy journey & professional conquest. Manage speed of Prado car simulator on new hurdles in Uphill missions. Also throttle monster SUV trucks to perform jumps as mountain climbing on wooden planks. Be ready to rotate steering wheel in scorching deserts or bumpy hills with rocks on game roads & ride monster truck in stunning visuals.

Extreme Rally Features:
- Mud Physics
- Extreme SUV driving
- Realistic crashing effects
- Speedy off-road missions
- Best visual effects
- Hummer adventure Simulator
- Controller Options for smooth ride
